name: Creamy Mock Hollandaise Sauce
author: Andie
summary: This sauce is great on poultry, fish, rare beef, steamed veggies (especially asparagus, broccoli, or cauliflower), whole grains, and wild rice.
ingredients: ½ cup milk, or as needed
directions: Mix cream cheese and egg yolks together in a bowl with an electric mixer
Stir lemon juice and salt together in a separate small bowl
Transfer cream cheese mixture to saucepan over low heat; whisk in lemon juice mixture
Increase heat to medium-low; bring cream cheese mixture to a boil, whisking constantly, about 3 minutes
Whisk milk in gradually until desired consistency is reached
Continue to cook, whisking constantly, until smooth sauce forms, 1 to 2 minutes
